theme.title: Compound time of 9/8. Dotted quarter note
theme.para: In this lesson the compound time of 9/8 is introduced, as well as two new rhythmic patterns. The 9/8 time has three beats and each beat is occupied by a 8th note. The measure is occupied by a dotted quarter note.
